docs.title: API / Interfaces
docs.text:
Choose what applies:

  • Service API (HTTP): define endpoints in openapi.yaml (OpenAPI 3.x)
  • Python library: document public functions/classes; consider docstrings
  • C++ library/app: document headers and public interfaces; consider Doxygen

docs.title: Interactions
docs.text: Describe how components communicate. - See System Diagram - See Component diagrams

docs.title: System Diagram
docs.text:
flowchart LR
  User --> UI
  UI --> Service
  Service --> DB[(Database)]

docs.title: Component Diagram (Template)
docs.text:
flowchart LR
  A[Component A] -->|calls| B[Component B]
  B --> C[(State Store)]

Duplicate this file to add diagrams for each component.

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
Provide runnable examples showing typical usage.

Each example should include: - Purpose - Setup steps - How to run - Expected output

docs.title: C++ Examples
docs.text: Place small C++ programs here demonstrating usage.
